column1: Uchi////3.) The Japanese cuisine - This may seem like a no-brainer
column2: but the strength of the menu isn't limited to the sushi.  Not only is the nigiri fresh
column3: but the rolls are creative without being overbearing
column4: and the hot and cold seasonal seafood tastings round out a perfect meal.  Standouts included the 'bacon tataki' (pork belly
column8: espresso fish caramel) and the 'mustang' roll (fresh­water eel
